name: jetleaf_retry
desc: JetLeaf Retry Library üçÉ

name: AbstractRetryFactory
desc:
Provides the foundational implementation for JetLeaf‚Äôs RetryFactory,
responsible for constructing, caching, and resolving retry-related metadata
from annotated application methods.

name: addDefinition
desc: Adds (or replaces) a RetryDefinition in the internal retry metadata registry.

name: findRecoveryMethod
desc:
Searches for a suitable recovery method annotated with Recover
within the given target object for a specific method.

name: getDefinition
desc:
Retrieves the RetryDefinition associated with the given method,
if any retry-related annotations are present.

name: getLog
desc:
Returns the logger instance used for diagnostic, warning, and debugging
messages emitted by this factory.

name: AnnotationAwareRetryFactory
desc:
AnnotationAwareRetryFactory is an implementation of ExecutableRetryFactory
that automatically scans application components for @Retryable annotations
and registers retry metadata for eligible methods.

name: AnnotationAwareRetryFactory.new
desc:
AnnotationAwareRetryFactory is an implementation of ExecutableRetryFactory
that automatically scans application components for @Retryable annotations
and registers retry metadata for eligible methods.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getBackoffPolicy
desc:
Returns the BackoffPolicy governing the computation of delay durations
between consecutive retry attempts.

name: getEventBus
desc: Returns the ApplicationEventBus associated with this context or factory.

name: getExecutor
desc:
Returns the RetryExecutor instance responsible for orchestrating
the execution of retryable operations.

name: getLog
desc:
Returns the logger instance used for diagnostic, warning, and debugging
messages emitted by this factory.

name: getPackageName
desc:
Represents an abstraction for identifying the package that an object,
resource, or service belongs to.

name: getRetryPolicy
desc:
Returns the configured RetryPolicy responsible for determining whether
additional retry attempts are permitted for a given RetryContext.

name: getStatistics
desc:
Returns the RetryStatistics collector that aggregates metrics related
to retry executions over time.

name: onReady
desc:
Interface to be implemented by pods that require initialization logic
after their properties have been set by the container.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: setApplicationEventBus
desc: Sets the ApplicationEventBus that this component can use for event operations.

name: Backoff
desc: Configures the backoff strategy for retry delays.

name: Backoff.new
desc: Configures the backoff strategy for retry delays.

name: delay
desc: Initial delay between retries in milliseconds.

name: maxDelay
desc: Maximum delay between retries in milliseconds.

name: multiplier
desc: Multiplier for exponential backoff.

name: random
desc: Whether to apply random jitter to the delay.

name: BackoffPolicy
desc: Strategy interface for controlling retry delay behavior between attempts.

name: backoff
desc:
Applies configuration metadata from a Backoff definition, usually
provided via the @Retryable annotation or programmatic configuration.

name: computeBackoff
desc: Computes the backoff duration for the current retry attempt.

name: DefaultRetryExecutor
desc:
The default implementation of RetryExecutor, responsible for orchestrating
the execution of retryable operations with configured policies, backoff,
listeners, and statistics.

name: DefaultRetryExecutor.new
desc: Default constructor for the executor.

name: execute
desc:
Executes the provided RetryCallback according to the configured
RetryPolicy and BackoffPolicy.

name: withBackoffPolicy
desc: Sets the BackoffPolicy that calculates delays between retry attempts.

name: withListeners
desc: Registers one or more RetryListeners that will be notified of retry lifecycle events.

name: withRetryPolicy
desc:
Configures the RetryPolicy that determines whether additional retry
attempts are permitted.

name: withStatistics
desc: Sets a RetryStatistics collector to track metrics about retry executions.

name: ExecutableRetryFactory
desc:
The ExecutableResilienceFactory provides a fully functional, intercepting
retry factory for retryable operations. It extends AbstractRetryFactory
and implements both MethodInterceptor and AroundMethodInterceptor to integrate
retry logic transparently into method invocations.

name: aroundInvocation
desc:
Invoked around the target method execution, allowing interception
both before and after invocation.

name: canIntercept
desc: Determines whether this interceptor can intercept the specified method.

name: getBackoffPolicy
desc:
Returns the BackoffPolicy governing the computation of delay durations
between consecutive retry attempts.

name: getEventBus
desc: Returns the ApplicationEventBus associated with this context or factory.

name: getExecutor
desc:
Returns the RetryExecutor instance responsible for orchestrating
the execution of retryable operations.

name: getRetryPolicy
desc:
Returns the configured RetryPolicy responsible for determining whether
additional retry attempts are permitted for a given RetryContext.

name: getStatistics
desc:
Returns the RetryStatistics collector that aggregates metrics related
to retry executions over time.

name: ExponentialBackoffPolicy
desc:
A standard implementation of BackoffPolicy that applies exponential backoff
between retry attempts, with optional randomization (‚Äújitter‚Äù).

name: ExponentialBackoffPolicy.new
desc: Creates a new ExponentialBackoffPolicy with the specified parameters.

name: backoff
desc:
Applies configuration metadata from a Backoff definition, usually
provided via the @Retryable annotation or programmatic configuration.

name: computeBackoff
desc: Computes the backoff duration for the current retry attempt.

name: FixedBackoffPolicy
desc:
A simple BackoffPolicy implementation that always returns a fixed delay
between retry attempts.

name: FixedBackoffPolicy.new
desc: Creates a new FixedBackoffPolicy with the specified _delay.

name: backoff
desc:
Applies configuration metadata from a Backoff definition, usually
provided via the @Retryable annotation or programmatic configuration.

name: computeBackoff
desc: Computes the backoff duration for the current retry attempt.

name: InMemoryStatistics
desc:
A simple, in-memory implementation of RetryStatistics for tracking
the lifecycle and outcomes of retry operations.

name: InMemoryStatistics.new
desc:
Creates a new InMemoryStatistics instance with all counters initialized
to zero.

name: getExhaustedCount
desc:
Returns the total number of operations that exhausted all retry
attempts and still failed.

name: getRecoveryCount
desc:
Returns the total number of recovery callbacks that were invoked
after retry exhaustion.

name: getStartedCount
desc: Returns the total number of retry operations that have been started.

name: getSuccessCount
desc:
Returns the total number of operations that completed successfully
without exhausting their retry limit.

name: incrementExhausted
desc: Increments the counter of retry operations that exhausted all attempts.

name: incrementRecovery
desc: Increments the counter of recovery callbacks invoked.

name: incrementStarted
desc: Increments the counter of retry operations that have started.

name: incrementSuccess
desc: Increments the counter of retry operations that succeeded.

name: reset
desc: Resets all recorded statistics to zero.

name: InvocationRetryEvent
desc:
A concrete retry event emitted specifically for a method invocation,
extending RetryEvent.

name: InvocationRetryEvent.withClock
desc: Constructs an invocation retry event with a source and timestamp.

name: Recover
desc: Marks a method as a recovery callback for failed retry attempts.

name: Recover.new
desc: Marks a method as a recovery callback for failed retry attempts.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equals
desc: Checks whether the given object is logically equivalent to this annotation.

name: hashCode
desc: Returns a hash code consistent with equality definition.

name: label
desc: Optional label to match with a specific @Retryable method.

name: operator ==
desc: Checks if this annotation is equal to another object.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: RecoveryCallback
desc: Defines a recovery strategy that executes after all retry attempts fail.

name: recover
desc: Executes the recovery logic once retries have been exhausted.

name: RetryAutoConfiguration
desc: JetLeaf auto-configuration entry point for the retry subsystem.

name: EXPONENTIAL_BACKOFF_POLICY_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the ExponentialBackoffPolicy.

name: FIXED_BACKOFF_POLICY_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the FixedBackoffPolicy.

name: RETRY_AUTO_CONFIGURATION_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RetryAutoConfiguration.

name: RETRY_EXECUTOR_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RetryExecutor.

name: RETRY_FACTORY_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RetryFactory.

name: RETRY_POLICY_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RetryPolicy.

name: RETRY_STATISTICS_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the RetryStatistics.

name: RetryAutoConfiguration.new
desc: JetLeaf auto-configuration entry point for the retry subsystem.

name: exponentialBackoffPolicy
desc: Declares an exponential BackoffPolicy pod.

name: fixedBackoffPolicy
desc: Declares a fixed BackoffPolicy pod.

name: retryExecutor
desc: Declares a RetryExecutor pod.

name: retryFactory
desc: Declares and exposes the default RetryFactory pod.

name: retryPolicy
desc: Declares a RetryPolicy pod.

name: retryStatistics
desc: Declares a RetryStatistics pod.

name: RetryCallback
desc: Represents a unit of work that should be executed within a retry operation.

name: execute
desc: Executes the callback logic within the given RetryContext.

name: setApplicationEventBus
desc: Sets the ApplicationEventBus that this component can use for event operations.

name: RetryContext
desc:
Represents the state and metadata of an ongoing retry operation within
the JetLeaf retry management framework.

name: getAttemptCount
desc: Returns the current attempt count (1-based).

name: getAttribute
desc: Retrieves a custom attribute value by its key.

name: getLastException
desc: Returns the last Exception encountered during the retry process, if any.

name: getName
desc: Returns the logical name or label of this retry operation.

name: registerException
desc: Registers a new retry attempt with the given exception.

name: setAttribute
desc: Sets a custom attribute with the given key and value.

name: RetryDefinition
desc:
Immutable metadata descriptor encapsulating retry and recovery
configuration for a specific method.

name: RetryDefinition.new
desc:
Immutable metadata descriptor encapsulating retry and recovery
configuration for a specific method.

name: listeners
desc: List of listeners on the retryable annotation

name: method
desc: The reflective representation of the method annotated with @Retryable.

name: retryable
desc: The retry configuration metadata extracted from @Retryable.

name: RetryEvent
desc:
A base event class representing a retry operation triggered during
method invocation.

name: RetryEvent.new
desc: Constructs a retry event for a given source method invocation.

name: RetryEvent.withClock
desc: Constructs a retry event with an explicit timestamp.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getPackageName
desc: Returns the package name for this event type.

name: getSource
desc: Returns the source of the event.

name: getTimestamp
desc: Returns the timestamp of the event.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RetryExecutor
desc:
RetryExecutor defines the core execution engine for retryable operations.
It coordinates retry policies, backoff strategies, listeners, and recovery callbacks
to provide robust resilience handling for method invocations.

name: execute
desc:
Executes the provided RetryCallback according to the configured
RetryPolicy and BackoffPolicy.

name: withBackoffPolicy
desc: Sets the BackoffPolicy that calculates delays between retry attempts.

name: withListeners
desc: Registers one or more RetryListeners that will be notified of retry lifecycle events.

name: withRetryPolicy
desc:
Configures the RetryPolicy that determines whether additional retry
attempts are permitted.

name: withStatistics
desc: Sets a RetryStatistics collector to track metrics about retry executions.

name: RetryExhaustedException
desc:
Exception thrown when all retry attempts for a Retryable operation
have been exhausted without success.

name: RetryExhaustedException.new
desc:
Exception thrown when all retry attempts for a Retryable operation
have been exhausted without success.

name: cause
desc: The underlying cause of this exception, if any.

name: context
desc: The retry context associated with the failed operation.

name: getCause
desc: The cause of this exception, if any.

name: getMessage
desc: The message associated with this exception.

name: getStackTrace
desc: The stack trace associated with this exception.

name: message
desc: The message describing the error.

name: stackTrace
desc: The associated stack trace.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RetryFactory
desc:
Factory interface responsible for discovering and providing
retry-related metadata (e.g., retry and recovery rules)
associated with annotated methods.

name: aroundInvocation
desc:
Invoked around the target method execution, allowing interception
both before and after invocation.

name: canIntercept
desc: Determines whether this interceptor can intercept the specified method.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getDefinition
desc:
Retrieves the RetryDefinition associated with the given method,
if any retry-related annotations are present.

name: RetryListener
desc: Defines lifecycle hooks for monitoring and reacting to retry operations.

name: onClose
desc: Called when the retry operation completes or closes.

name: onError
desc: Called when an exception is caught during execution.

name: onOpen
desc: Called when a retry operation is first opened or started.

name: onRetry
desc: Called before each retry attempt, excluding the initial one.

name: RetryPolicy
desc: Strategy interface for retry control and decision-making.

name: canRetry
desc:
Determines whether a retry attempt is allowed given the current
RetryContext.

name: retryable
desc:
Applies metadata from a Retryable configuration (e.g. from
annotations or external configuration) to this policy, returning
a new configured instance.

name: shouldRetryForException
desc:
Determines whether the provided exception qualifies for retry
under the current policy configuration and RetryContext.

name: RetryStatistics
desc: Provides statistical metrics and counters for retry operations.

name: getExhaustedCount
desc:
Returns the total number of operations that exhausted all retry
attempts and still failed.

name: getRecoveryCount
desc:
Returns the total number of recovery callbacks that were invoked
after retry exhaustion.

name: getStartedCount
desc: Returns the total number of retry operations that have been started.

name: getSuccessCount
desc:
Returns the total number of operations that completed successfully
without exhausting their retry limit.

name: incrementExhausted
desc: Increments the counter of retry operations that exhausted all attempts.

name: incrementRecovery
desc: Increments the counter of recovery callbacks invoked.

name: incrementStarted
desc: Increments the counter of retry operations that have started.

name: incrementSuccess
desc: Increments the counter of retry operations that succeeded.

name: reset
desc: Resets all recorded statistics to zero.

name: Retryable
desc:
Annotation that marks a method as retryable, indicating that the JetLeaf
runtime should automatically retry its invocation when certain exceptions
occur.

name: Retryable.new
desc:
Annotation that marks a method as retryable, indicating that the JetLeaf
runtime should automatically retry its invocation when certain exceptions
occur.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: backoff
desc: Backoff policy configuration.

name: equals
desc: Checks whether the given object is logically equivalent to this annotation.

name: hashCode
desc: Returns a hash code consistent with equality definition.

name: label
desc: Optional label for this retry configuration.

name: listeners
desc: Custom listener classes for retry events.

name: maxAttempts
desc: Maximum number of attempts (including the first invocation).

name: noRetryFor
desc: Exception types that should NOT trigger a retry.

name: operator ==
desc: Checks if this annotation is equal to another object.

name: retryFor
desc:
Exception types that should trigger a retry.
If empty, all exceptions will trigger retries (except those in noRetryFor).

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: SimpleRetryContext
desc:
A basic implementation of RetryContext that tracks retry attempts,
the last exception thrown, and arbitrary attributes.

name: SimpleRetryContext.new
desc: Creates a new SimpleRetryContext with an optional name.

name: getAttemptCount
desc: Returns the current attempt count (1-based).

name: getAttribute
desc: Retrieves a custom attribute value by its key.

name: getLastException
desc: Returns the last Exception encountered during the retry process, if any.

name: getName
desc: Returns the logical name or label of this retry operation.

name: registerException
desc: Registers a new retry attempt with the given exception.

name: setAttribute
desc: Sets a custom attribute with the given key and value.

name: SimpleRetryPolicy
desc:
A straightforward implementation of RetryPolicy that limits the number
of retry attempts and determines retry eligibility based on exception type.

name: SimpleRetryPolicy.new
desc: Creates a new SimpleRetryPolicy with the specified parameters.

name: canRetry
desc:
Determines whether a retry attempt is allowed given the current
RetryContext.

name: retryable
desc:
Applies metadata from a Retryable configuration (e.g. from
annotations or external configuration) to this policy, returning
a new configured instance.

name: shouldRetryForException
desc:
Determines whether the provided exception qualifies for retry
under the current policy configuration and RetryContext.
